newsitem.title: GERMANY: SOCCER-BORUSSIA DORTMUND LOSE FEIERSINGER THROUGH INJURY.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-BORUSSIA DORTMUND LOSE FEIERSINGER THROUGH INJURY.

text.p: German champions Borussia Dortmund have lost a second libero to a thigh injury.
Austrian international Wolfgang Feiersinger followed Matthias Sammer on to the treatment table after injuring his thigh against Bayern Munich on Sunday.
He will be out of action for several weeks, his club said on Tuesday. Sammer has already been sidelined for three weeks.
Coach Ottmar Hitzfeld said Scot Paul Lambert would probably fill Feiersinger's role when Dortmund host Arminia Bielefeld on Saturday.
He does not have the option of playing Stefan Reuter because he is serving a one-match ban.
